title: Why is gankplank always disabled ????
body: All I want to bloody do is ply gankplank, but he seems to always be disabled..... what the hell is going on with this champ...

replies.body: Do you normally tell people that they have a "problem", how do you think {{champion:41}}  would feel if he heard about this.

That cannon explosion caused some serious mental damage.

It's more politically correct to say he has a learning difficulty.
